title: HELP ME
body: I was told by my friends that when u create an account u get around 400rp. im level 28 and still have not gotten this, have they removed this feature?

replies.body: Aw man, they removed it? :/ i was gonna make an account and give myself xp boosts

Yes, they removed this feature earlier this year with the introduction of Hextech chests. When you reached level 3 (I think) you should have recieved 2 premium chests, which give you Garen, Ashe and a random skin shard.

If you never got these you should probably send a ticket to Riot Support. Best of luck with hitting 30 and ranked!
